title: A Deadly DRAFT
body_text:
From a fun-filled family gathering to the brutality known as the
Dodgeball Draft
- this was the 141st and those who felt the sting from one of the unforgiving bulletballs or simply looked on in horror will tell you this was not for the weak at heart.
Flash Results by Game
ONE: 1, 3, 7
TWO: 2, 4, 5, 6
Team ONE
Justin Pierce, Alysha Kelly, Gerald Lewis, John Tronolone, Travis Mills, Justin Wolf, Chris Adams, Lauren Stopa, Eamon Fitzpatrick, Ryan Letsche, Juan Londono, Kevin Fitzpatrick.
Team TWO
Ray Marzarella, Mike "Sputz" Krott, Dan Spengeman, Matt Marzarella, Dan Turner, Kevin Megill, Bob Cornero, Kevin Adams, Dan Fitzpatrick, Mike Edwards.
The Rules
: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match
: Team TWO defeated Team ONE, 4 - 3. Teams were selected via the
Dodgeball Draft
.
Moments & Stars
: Eamon Fitzpatrick the victim of an impactful Kevin Megill nutshots; Alysha Kelly's game-winning elimination on Ray Marzarella; the battle between brothers Dan and Kevin Fitzpatrick; Chris Adams hit with a painball from teammate Matt Marzarella while in a handstand position
Attendance
: 22, comprised of 20 men and 2 women
New Players
: Matt Marzarella, Eamon Fitzpatrick
Other Notes
: Alysha Kelly and Lauren Stopa were the only female competitors. This was only the fourth
Dodgeball Draft
. Diana DiBuccio missed her first event since DODGEBALL LVII on September 23, 2006, having participated in an amazing 83 straight events.
*Draft History:
DODGEBALL CXX-SIX
--
DODGEBALL 108
--
DODGEBALL 101
*
DODGEBALL 141 Pictures
courtesy Dan Spengeman!
"Family Affair" Aftermath
: Notice how the only new players were that of relatives - Matt Marzarella
(younger brother of Ray Marzarella)
and Eamon Fitzpatrick
(younger brother of both Dan and Kevin Fitzpatrick)
. Father Fitzpatrick also got a glimpse of the action with a courtside seat on the outside bleachers.
body_html:
From a fun-filled family gathering to the brutality known as the Dodgeball Draft - this was the 141st and those who felt the sting from one of the unforgiving bulletballs or simply looked on in horror will tell you this was not for the weak at heart.

Flash Results by Game
ONE: 1, 3, 7
TWO: 2, 4, 5, 6

Team ONE
Justin Pierce, Alysha Kelly, Gerald Lewis, John Tronolone, Travis Mills, Justin Wolf, Chris Adams, Lauren Stopa, Eamon Fitzpatrick, Ryan Letsche, Juan Londono, Kevin Fitzpatrick.

Team TWO
Ray Marzarella, Mike "Sputz" Krott, Dan Spengeman, Matt Marzarella, Dan Turner, Kevin Megill, Bob Cornero, Kevin Adams, Dan Fitzpatrick, Mike Edwards.

The Rules: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match: Team TWO defeated Team ONE, 4 - 3. Teams were selected via the Dodgeball Draft.
Moments & Stars: Eamon Fitzpatrick the victim of an impactful Kevin Megill nutshots; Alysha Kelly's game-winning elimination on Ray Marzarella; the battle between brothers Dan and Kevin Fitzpatrick; Chris Adams hit with a painball from teammate Matt Marzarella while in a handstand position
Attendance: 22, comprised of 20 men and 2 women
New Players: Matt Marzarella, Eamon Fitzpatrick
Other Notes: Alysha Kelly and Lauren Stopa were the only female competitors. This was only the fourth Dodgeball Draft. Diana DiBuccio missed her first event since DODGEBALL LVII on September 23, 2006, having participated in an amazing 83 straight events.

*Draft History: DODGEBALL CXX-SIX -- DODGEBALL 108 -- DODGEBALL 101
*DODGEBALL 141 Pictures courtesy Dan Spengeman!

"Family Affair" Aftermath: Notice how the only new players were that of relatives - Matt Marzarella (younger brother of Ray Marzarella) and Eamon Fitzpatrick (younger brother of both Dan and Kevin Fitzpatrick). Father Fitzpatrick also got a glimpse of the action with a courtside seat on the outside bleachers.
